Key Match Events: India were reduced to 0/0 off 9 balls, the longest time to get off the mark in a T20I for India
Lungi Ngidi became the first bowler in the tournament to dismiss Virat Kohli
David Miller clinched the win with consecutive boundaries off Bhuvneshwar, with two balls left in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: Temba Bavuma said his South Africa side are flying under the radar at the T20 World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised India's clinical win over Netherlands
Rohit Sharma said the match-winning partnership from Aiden Markram and David Miller was decisive
Rohit Sharma mentioned that India were a little poor in the field and gave too many chances
Miscellaneous Highlights: The five-wicket win sent South Africa back to the top of the table in Group 2 of the Super 12s
The match was played on a rapid batting track in Perth
Others: South Africa's excellence has pushed Pakistan to the brink of elimination from the tournament
